item.description:
Have commitment issues? Learn about the fear and anxiety of commitment phobia and ways to be more committed to life, work and relationships in ways that work in which you still feel free.

7:30-9:30pm, $40, sliding scale if needed $40-20

Herb Pearce is a personality types expert, particularly with the Enneagram and Myers-Briggs. He is a therapist for individuals, couples and families, a personal coach and is the author of The Idiot's Guide to the Enneagram, Herb's Tips for Living and soon to be Enneagram for Advanced Students.

781 648 3737      , www.herbpearce.com, herb@herbpearce.com
item.how_to_find_us: Arlington Heights, Corner of Tanager St. and Wollaston Ave.
item.name: Commitmentphobia
